titles.title: Civilian Conservation Center Enhancement Act of 2025
Civilian Conservation Center Enhancement Act of 2025
To amend Public Law 91378 to authorize activities relating to Civilian Conservation Centers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Workforce, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
